item.title: 【天灭中共】48位美国弗州议员致信国务卿 要求制止中共迫害法轮功 停止活摘器官
item.description: **原文如下，涉及中共迫害法轮功及活摘器官罪行： ** **Commonwealth of Virginia ** General Assembly RICHMOND July 29, 2020 The Honorable Michael Pompeo Secretary of State United States Department of State 2201 C Street, NW Washington, D.C. …
